issues.message: The updated assertion does not match the actual subject line; it should be '✅ We\'re building your site from scratch…' instead of the proposed 'We're building your site from scratch — here's the plan'.

risks: The test may still fail after this change if the subject line is incorrect.
Potential confusion for developers if the assertion is not aligned with actual output.
assumptions: The email subject line has been updated in the template.
The changes are meant to reflect the most current email subject line.

issues.message: The new assertion does not match the expected subject line; it should be '✅ We\'re building your website', not 'We\'re building your site from scratch — here\'s the plan'.

risks: The test may fail again if the subject line does not match the new assertion
Potential confusion for developers reviewing the test if the assertion is incorrect
assumptions: The subject line in the email template has not been recently changed
The test is meant to assert the current expected output of the email subject line
